products.Description: iPhone 7 smartphone was launched in September 2016. The phone comes with a 4.70-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 750 pixels by 1334 pixels at a PPI of 326 pixels per inch. ... The Apple iPhone 7 is powered by quad-core Apple A10 Fusion processor and it comes with 2GB of RAM.
Samsung is the largest mobile phone maker in its home market of South Korea, and the third largest in the world.
Sony Xperia Z4 smartphone was launched in April 2015. The phone comes with a 5.20-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1080 pixels by 1920 pixels.
